sources.title: Happy Tots (1939)
sources.description: The King declares a Festive Day in Happy Tots Kingdom and all his subjects, the Happy Tots, are invited to the celebration. Once there, they all have a great time and there are no conflicts in sight in this entry in the Happy Tots cartoon series, which isn't part of the Scrappy series. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/happy-tots-1939/
